paragraphs.content: Chapter 3
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 3

paragraphs.content: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.

paragraphs.content: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.

paragraphs.content: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.

paragraphs.content: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.

paragraphs.content: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:

paragraphs.content: For which things’ sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:
paragraphs.contentHtml: For which things’ sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:

paragraphs.content: In the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.

paragraphs.content: But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.

paragraphs.content: Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;

paragraphs.content: And have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:

paragraphs.content: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond nor free: but Christ is all, and in all.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond nor free: but Christ is all, and in all.

paragraphs.content: Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;

paragraphs.content: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.

paragraphs.content: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.

paragraphs.content: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.

paragraphs.content: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

paragraphs.content: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.

paragraphs.content: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.

paragraphs.content: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.

paragraphs.content: Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.

paragraphs.content: Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.

paragraphs.content: Servants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Servants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:

paragraphs.content: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;

paragraphs.content: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.

paragraphs.content: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
